title: Innovating Social Studies Through Creative Technology Integration in Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Non-real-time online learning in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment, focusing on elementary school teachers acquiring methods to apply creative techniques in social studies curriculum design

learning_goals: Learners can plan social studies design projects utilizing various digital tools
Learners can propose ≥3 creative problem-solving strategies through open-ended technology utilization
Learners can explain methods for effectively conveying social messages through design outputs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
